@graph.name: Tofu Scramble and Scramble Seasoning - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: The best vegan tofu scramble that is fluffy yet creamy and tastes just like eggs thanks to my secret scramble seasoning. Gluten-free.

@graph.name: Easy Scramble Seasoning Mix and the Best Ever Tofu Scramble
@graph.description: Easy and versatile Tofu scramble seasoning Recipea and The best vegan tofu scramble that is fluffy yet creamy and tastes just like eggs thanks to my secret scramble seasoning. Gluten-free.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon Kala namak, which is Indian sulphur black salt
1/4 cup chopped green onion (keep the green parts of the onion for garnish)
15 ounce pack of firm tofu divided
1/4 - 1/2  cup   water (or use unsweetened non dairy milk for creamier)
1 1/2 tablespoons  scramble seasoning plus more for garnish
green onion or cilantro for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Scramble seasoning: To make the scramble seasoning, mix everything in a bowl and set aside or store in a sealed glass bottle for up to 2 months.
recipeInstructions.name: Scramble seasoning: To make the scramble seasoning, mix everything in a bowl and set aside or store in a sealed glass bottle for up to 2 months.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the tofu scramble, heat a skillet over medium heat. Add oil then add the vegetables and cook until they are golden on some edges.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the tofu scramble, heat a skillet over medium heat. Add oil then add the vegetables and cook until they are golden on some edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the tofu block and take about a quarter of the tofu block. Add to a blender. Add the seasoning and a 1/4 cup of water and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the tofu block and take about a quarter of the tofu block. Add to a blender. Add the seasoning and a 1/4 cup of water and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: You might need more water. Add 1-2 tablespoons at a time and blend until it's super creamy. You can also use 3 oz silken tofu instead of the firm tofu for the eggy mix
recipeInstructions.name: You might need more water. Add 1-2 tablespoons at a time and blend until it's super creamy. You can also use 3 oz silken tofu instead of the firm tofu for the eggy mix

recipeInstructions.text: Then add this creamy mixture to the skillet then mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add this creamy mixture to the skillet then mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: When it's just about to boil, add the crumbled up rest of the block of the tofu and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: When it's just about to boil, add the crumbled up rest of the block of the tofu and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until the mixture is homogenous and the tofu is evenly colored with yellow. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Take off heat
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until the mixture is homogenous and the tofu is evenly colored with yellow. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Take off heat

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, sprinkle a little bit of the salt, black pepper, green onions, and some more of the scramble seasoning all over the scramble and then serve.
recipeInstructions.name: To serve, sprinkle a little bit of the salt, black pepper, green onions, and some more of the scramble seasoning all over the scramble and then serve.
